Structure# CAScrollLayerScrollMode

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.5+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
struct CAScrollLayerScrollMode
```

## [Topics](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode#topics)

### [Initializers](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode#Initializers)

[`init(rawValue: String)`](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode/init(rawvalue:))### [Type Properties](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode#Type-Properties)

[`static let both: CAScrollLayerScrollMode`](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode/both)The receiver is able to scroll both horizontally and vertically.[`static let horizontally: CAScrollLayerScrollMode`](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode/horizontally)The receiver is able to scroll horizontally.[`static let none: CAScrollLayerScrollMode`](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode/none)The receiver is unable to scroll.[`static let vertically: CAScrollLayerScrollMode`](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode/vertically)The receiver is able to scroll vertically.## [Relationships](/documentation/quartzcore/cascrolllayerscrollmode#relationships)
